column4: I get the following error when trying to play N: ./n_v14: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++-libc6.2-2.so.3: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
the game can be found here if anyone would like to try to figure out my problem: http://www.harveycartel.org/metanet/n_v1linux.tar.gz
what problem are you having with it?
open a terminal and cd into the directory and do ./whatever
to run that game, you need to install libstdc++2.10-glibc2.2 "sudo apt-get install libstdc++2.10-glibc2.2"
when I start the game, it says hit spacebar to begin
did you go into the controls?
go into the controls and try to see what is up. I deleted it after I found the dependency
I just tried the game. You use space to start the level. The arrows to move and shift to jump.
also a little trick. Play music while you are starting it so that it doesn't lag
are you sure? mine uses macromedia flash player 6. I tried to use the flash 9 standalone but it only wants flash movies for whatever reason
ok so it should be good to go
I have 9 beta installed, both the standalone and the plugin and it works fine
start the game over and go into the configure
works fine here. I don't know what is wrong with yours.
